channel.title: Stinky Error After Connect
channel.description:
After connect the client starts lagging and I'm guessing that the CPU is going up abit, and this is the error:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:192) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:132) at Class46.method581(Class46.java:271) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:188) at Class7.method188(Class7.java:1160) at client.method142(client.java:10489) at client.method115(client.java:8795) at client.method62(client.java:2860) at client.method7(client.java:1926) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4324) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
And this is my Run.bat:
[code]@ECHO OFF title SwarIsle Client JAVA -jar swarisle.jar[/code]
I just jarred it and made it run the jar.

item.title: Stinky Error After Connect
item.dc:creator: @Swarfega Swarfega
item.description:
@Swarfega wrote:

After connect the client starts lagging and Iâ€™m guessing that the CPU is going up abit, and this is the error:

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:192) at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:132) at Class46.method581(Class46.java:271) at Class46.method578(Class46.java:188) at Class7.method188(Class7.java:1160) at client.method142(client.java:10489) at client.method115(client.java:8795) at client.method62(client.java:2860) at client.method7(client.java:1926) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4324) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

And this is my Run.bat:

@ECHO OFF title SwarIsle Client JAVA -jar swarisle.jar

I just jarred it and made it run the jar.
